Interface ec.e.rep.steward.DataHolder

public interface DataHolder
DataHolder is the interface implemented by DataHolderStewards. We don't anticipate needing other classes besides DataHolderSteward but these structures are so intertwined we need to break this one out as an interface to break compiler dependency loops.

acceptData(Object, DataHolder)
addCertificate(Certificate)
certifiedBy(Verifier)
getCryptohash()
giveDataTo(DataRequestor)
handleFailure(Exception, DataHolder)
held()

certifiedBy 
 public abstract boolean certifiedBy(Verifier verifier)
addCertificate 
 public abstract void addCertificate(Certificate certificate)
held 
 public abstract Object held() throws RepositoryKeyNotFoundException, IOException
giveDataTo 
 public abstract void giveDataTo(DataRequestor requestor)
acceptData 
 public abstract void acceptData(Object data,
                                 DataHolder yourHolder)
handleFailure 
 public abstract void handleFailure(Exception failure,
                                    DataHolder yourHolder)
getCryptohash 
 public abstract CryptoHash getCryptohash()
